quotes.quote: Those who sought the future hoped to gain the winning gamble on tomorrow's race. Instead they found themselves trapped into a lifetime whose every heartbeat and anguished wail was known.
A time to keep and a time to cast away; a time for love and a time to hate; a time of war and a time of peace.
The joy of living, its beauty is all bound up in the fact that life can surprise you
One discovers the future in the past, and both are part of a whole.
